author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-188, ISIS-232: more on quickstart example + minor wicket improvements
* mandatory class missing for some scalar panels
* change rendering of entity actions and grouped actions
* application name shown on sign-in page

author: julianfoad
msg: (output-changes): Document the 'svn mergeinfo' default output change.

author: dennisl
msg: Do not repeat the project name in the title, it will be put there automatically by the Site Plugin.

author: stefan2
msg: In fsfs-reorg, address int64 -> size_t conversion warnings in 32 bit builds.
This limits all file sizes and offsets to 4 GB under 32 bits. Larger values
window_cache_entry_t): store offsets and sizes as size_t in data structs
read_revision_file): replace all apr_int64_t with apr_size_t
main): ditto + limit parsed offsets to APR_SIZE_MAX
